body_html: When eigenvectors is False, symeig returns junk for the eigenvectors. I think the Lapack library uses the memory as a scratch space but I'm not sure. zero-ing it out is probably a good idea.
body_text: When eigenvectors is False, symeig returns junk for the eigenvectors. I think the Lapack library uses the memory as a scratch space but I'm not sure. zero-ing it out is probably a good idea.
body: When eigenvectors is False, symeig returns junk for the eigenvectors. I think the Lapack library uses the memory as a scratch space but I'm not sure. zero-ing it out is probably a good idea.
